programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Uma Pistola para Ringo, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Após assaltar o banco local, uma gangue liderada pelo cruel Sancho se refugia em uma fazenda tomando como reféns seus habitantes.

programme.title: Jake Grandão, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: O Dólar Furado, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Estados Unidos, segunda metade do século 19. Gary O'Hara é um ex-capitão do Exército dos Estados Confederados.

programme.title: Que Assim Seja, Trinity, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Um aventureiro protege um garoto que herdou um terreno sob o qual há um rico campo de petróleo. O menino é ameaçado por vilões perigosos que querem prejudicá-lo e tomar a terra.

programme.title: Quando Explode a Vingança, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Juan Miranda é um camponês rude com coração de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory é um revolucionário irlandês que é especialista em dinamite e vive agora no México.

programme.title: ESTREIA - Com a Corda no Pescoço, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Condenado à forca, Henry Moon é capturado enquanto tentava fugir para o México, mas descobre que existe uma lei local que perdoa os crimes de quem se casa com uma mulher solteira ou viúva.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Original Gangster, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Conheça a diferente vida de Castor: órfão quando criança, forçado a sobreviver no deserto, até crescer e chegar a Londres, onde se tornou um dos principais chefões do submundo do crime.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Experimentos Macabros, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Um homem e uma mulher acordam após uma cirurgia em um sanatório abandonado, sem nenhuma lembrança de quem são ou de como chegaram lá.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: O Dia Da Múmia, (2014, Monsters)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack Wells explora a tumba do rei Neferu na esperança de recuperar um diamante lendário quando a múmia do rei retornar dos mortos em busca de vítimas humanas.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Tsukiyomi, que deveria estar morto, possui Agome e aparece diante de Hoshiyomi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak está trazendo sacerdotes virtuosos perto da morte e perscrutando suas mentes. Ele está tentando investigar o local que liga os mundos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak foi dividido em dois. Metade volta à vida na forma de uma criança vestida de branco.

programme.title: Kanta é uma criança youkai lontra. A cabeça de seu pai foi tomada por Hakudoshi e ele procura o corpo de seu pai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Viagem em Busca do Pai

programme.title: O local entre este mundo e o próximo, onde está o fragmento da Jóia, é o cemitério do pai de Inuyasha .
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e o grupo chegam na terra do fogo. Eles descobrem um portal gigante dentro de uma caverna nas montanhas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Abi, A Incontrolável Manipuladora de Aves

programme.sub-title: A Trágica Canção de Amor do Destino: Parte 2

programme.title: Para derrotar Narak, Kagura procura pelo Sesshomaru.

programme.title: Agome e os outros sentem a presença de Kikyo e de sua de sua flecha purificadora.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A princesa Abi e Tekkei sentem que as pessoas continuam interferindo desde que se envolveram com Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A princesa Abi não gosta de Narak e ataca um castelo que pertencente a humanos envolvidos com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kikyo se reencontra com Inuyasha e ela o aconselha a não levar Agome com ele, porque Narak está querendo usá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Hakudoshi lança um enxame de ratos youkais de nicho para atrair Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A fim de alcançar o coração de Narak e se vingar, Kohaku não pode desafiá-lo.c
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Caçador de Dragões, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: Depois que o pai de Will é morto por um dragão, ele embarca em uma jornada épica para se vingar do monstro .

programme.desc: Uma jovem nobre deve cumprir seu chamado para se tornar o novo paladino, o lendário matador de dragões.

programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.desc: Uma jovem nobre deve cumprir seu chamado para se tornar o novo paladino, o lendário matador de dragões.

programme.desc: Uma feiticeira cruel assume Camelot e usa três dragões mortais para caçar os restantes Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Danger Diabolik, (1968, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The suave thief called Diabolik can’t get enough of life’s good – or glittery – things. Not when there are currency shipments to steal from under the noses of government officials and priceless jewels to lift from the boudoirs of the rich.

programme.title: The 39 Steps, (1935, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

programme.title: Stalag 17, (1953, War)
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole, (1951, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy, including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)

programme.title: Some Like It Hot, (1959, Screwball)

programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: Casino Royale, (1967, Comedy)

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Action)

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and 50 Cent star as inmates who must break out of a top secret, high-security prison in this non-stop action-thriller.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (2012, Action)

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Tucker & Dale Vs. Evil, (2010, Comedy)

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)

programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime Feature Films)
programme.desc: 2029 – A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" – a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim’s memory.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Son of Rambow, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hilariously fresh take on friendship, family, film heroes and the death-defying adventures of growing up in the video age.

programme.title: Eagle Vs Shark, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Lily is reserved and awkward, while Jarrod is an introspective oddball who's blind to Lily's affection for him -- until a celebration mixed with a strange plan to exact revenge on Jarrod's high school foe brings the two misfits together.

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.title: You're Next, (2014, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: The Davisons' family reunion goes awry when their home comes under siege by a mask-wearing team of crossbow-bearing assailants.

programme.title: Green Room, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After witnessing a shocking crime, a young rock band is unexpectedly thrust into a life-or-death battle to escape the clutches of a diabolical club owner (Patrick Stewart) and his ruthless henchmen in this white-knuckle thriller.

programme.title: Benny & Joon, (2006, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp and Mary Stuart Masterson star in this quirky romantic Drama about two misfits who Comedye together as a result of an unusual poker game. Aidan Quinn and Julianne Moore co-star.

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides, (2012, Independent Drama)

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer, (1993, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Clerks, (1994, Comedy)

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.title: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.title: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin'emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin'emon's ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!

programme.title: Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!

programme.title: Kin'emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke's mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!

programme.title: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!

programme.title: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!

programme.title: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed's back to her home.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!

programme.title: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill – Thunder Bagua!

programme.title: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!

programme.title: On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile,
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!

programme.title: Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!

programme.title: In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rampage! The Prisoners – Luffy and Kid!

programme.title: Sanji's Special Soba becomes very popular but some gang members come to disturb his business and knock over a customer's bowl. Infuriated, Sanji takes them down and gives the customer, a little girl named Toko.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Sensation! Sanji's Special Soba!

programme.title: Wano's top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. There is a crowd of people on the street as well as Sanji and the others. While everyone is fascinated by her, some seeking vengeance get in the Oiran's way.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano's Most Beautiful Woman – Komurasaki!

programme.title: Zoro who has been wandering around the Land of Wano since he got separated from his friends meets a sycophant named Tonoyasu. Tonoyasu paid for Zoro's sushi and to pay him back, Zoro gambles at dice.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!

programme.title: Zoro is taken to the sycophant Tonoyasu's poor hometown, Ebisu Town where people laugh away their misfortune.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes in!

programme.title: As the Big Mom Pirates approach the Land of Wano, Kaido's subordinates led by King and Queen try to get rid of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!

programme.title: Sanji faces Page One, a Headliner of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, who questions the soba cook's true identity. Sanji uses Germa's device for the first time and transforms himself into Stealth Black while dubbing himself Soba Mask.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: While the banquet grows livelier at Orochi's Castle, Robin is confronted by his ninja force called Oniwabanshu. In the meanwhile in Kuri, Chopper, Tama, and Momonosuke train themselves preparing for the incoming battle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Orochi's Menacing Oniwabanshu!

programme.title: At the banquet, the Shogun Orochi starts to talk about his late old enemy which bores the attendees. Suddenly, the Oiran's child attendant Toko bursts with laughter and won't stop. Orochi becomes furious and attacks her.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!

programme.title: In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden's Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper's group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!

programme.title: At the Excavation Labor Camp in Udon, Luffy tries to save Old Man Hyo and stands up to Vice Warden Daifuku and Warden Babanuki with his physical strength weakened by the Sea Prism Stone cuffs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!

programme.title: Luffy and Old Man Hyo try to climb up the wall and break out of the Excavation Labor Camp, but Queen the Plague stands in their way and gives them a hard time!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy fights quite a few Queen's men at once in the deadly sumo match while protecting Old Man Hyo! Meanwhile, Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins comes to raid the bathhouse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Luffy deals with the endless supply of opponents trying to figure out the way to use Haki that Rayleigh taught him a while ago. Meanwhile, Zoro faces Gyukimaru who is accusing him of stealing Shusui.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: The duel between Zoro and Gyukimaru is interrupted by Kamazo, Orochi's assassin who came after a little girl Toko. Without Shusui, Zoro has a hard time fighting the two at the same time, but he finds an unlikely third sword to take down the enemies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!

programme.title: Luffy's next enemies in the deadly sumo match in the Excavation Labor Camp are two tough Gifters. Much to Old Man Hyo's surprise, Luffy keeps practicing using Haki properly at the same time as he fights them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: The Last Round-Up, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is a cattle rancher determined to protect the interests of neighboring ranchers and Indians against unscrupulous land manipulators when local authorities plan to build an aqueduct.

programme.title: Trail To San Antone, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tries to help a young jockey get back on track after an “accident” arranged by a horse trainer ruins his career. Action-packed adventure with fantastic stunts, and Gene Autry's Champion.

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Back in Texas, Capt. Call organizes a mustang drive to Montana. He hires a Gideon, a former Texas Ranger, to head the drive. Newt falls into trouble in is rescued by a crusty rancher named Dunnegan.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part I - The Vision

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Clara's ranch meets an fiery fate, and she decides to join with Gideon. Call has the misfortune to meet up with the desperado Cherokee Jack. Dunnegan tells Newt of his inheritance plans.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Legacy

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Clara's ranch meets an fiery fate, and she decides to join with Gideon. Call has the misfortune to meet up with the desperado Cherokee Jack. Dunnegan tells Newt of his inheritance plans.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Legacy

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: A range war is erupting in Montana, and Call and Dunnegan meet alone to settle their differences. Cherokee Jack is running amok. Call tells Newt about their true relationship.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part IV - The Passing

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Vampires)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmusch’s ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Identity, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: What if every choice we ever make was already made for us? What if there really were no coincidences in life and our destinies were already predetermined? Ten strangers with secrets are brought together in a savage rainstorm. Rated: R

programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A disillusioned war veteran, Rannulph Junah, agrees to play a game of golf. He finds the game futile until his caddy, Bagger Vance, teaches him the secret of the authentic golf stroke.

programme.title: As Rick and the others continue to acclimate to their new surroundings, they consider a return to normalcy.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While trying to secure a new home, Rick and his group face challenges, and question the utopia they find themselves in.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: When life within the walls begins to mimic life outside, the group realizes that sheltered life may not be possible.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl finds trouble while on a run; Rick and the group feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble approaches the gates.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A small group, including Rick, runs into hurdles while trying to return to Alexandria, and some may not make it back.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Morgan recalls his travels from King County to Alexandria, where he encountered a solo survivor who taught him a new code to live by.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The sheltered citizens inside the walls of Alexandria must face a grim reality that might be too much for them to handle; Deanna doubts her leadership.
